fields.summary: Android: Globals not accessible in CommonJS modules

components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

fields.description: This ticket is a placeholder for testing that will be performed after TIMOB-11752 is resolved. In short, globals are accessible in commonjs modules in iOS and Mobileweb, but not on Android. See TIMOB-11752 for the full details.
fields.summary: Resolve global variables in commonjs modules platform disparities
